description.value:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.xn6EaAbQlAB5ZGe6]{Winter Sleet}

Bone-chilling, swirling sleet surrounds you, cruel as deepest winter. Surfaces in your kinetic aura are coated in slippery ice. A creature that moves on this uneven ground immediately falls unless it @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.M76ycLAqHoAgbcej]{Balances} (DC 15). A creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} on the ice, as normal for uneven ground. You're immune to these effects.

If a creature on the ice is critically hit by one of your water impulses or critically fails at a save against one, that creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} until the end of its next turn.
